title: Fried rice with bacon and peas
ingredients: ['250g uncooked white rice', '400ml water', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 teaspoons vegetable oil, divided', '120g bacon, cut into strips', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '280g frozen green peas, thawed', '2 spring onions, chopped']
